thread.title: CHS JV football player’s grandma beats cancer to cheer on her favorite player
thread.title_full: CHS JV football player’s grandma beats cancer to cheer on her favorite player

author: Joe Klarer
title: CHS JV football player’s grandma beats cancer to cheer on her favorite player
text:
1 of 2 Photo by Kim Gaines 
Logan Arledge was thrilled to have his grandmother back at his football games after she beat cancer just five months after being diagnosed in May. Photo by Lisa Steffes 
Mary Mones, grandmother of Calaveras JV football player Logan Arledge, holds up a sign declaring she had her last chemotherapy treatment for breast cancer at the Oct. 9 home game against Argonaut. hot featured Fighting to get back to the stands CHS JV football player’s grandma beats cancer to cheer on her favorite player
